required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Prognostic Value of Biomarkers in HR + / HER2 - Advanced Breast Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: An Observational Study：Prognostic Value of Biomarkers in HR + / HER2 - Advanced Breast Cancer

lead_sponsor.agency: Sun Yat-Sen Memorial Hospital of Sun Yat-Sen University

clinical_study.source: Sun Yat-Sen Memorial Hospital of Sun Yat-Sen University

brief_summary.textblock: Our study is aimed to explore a prospective observational clinical study on the efficacy prediction and survival prediction of HR + / HER2 - biomarkers detection in patients with advanced breast cancer. This study is a prospective, observational clinical study. We analyzed the incidence of biomarker mutations in HR + / HER2 - advanced breast cancer (stage IV), and the correlation between biomarkers and therapeutic efficacy, survival, and prognosis.

primary_outcome.measure: Correlation between biomarkers and efficacy of tumor therapy
primary_outcome.description: explore the correlation between biomarkers and the ORR. The biomarkers will be test by nest-generation sequence, which include 520 genes and tumor mutation burden, like ERBB2/TP53/PIK3CA/ERBB4/CCND1 and so on.

secondary_outcome.description: The time from the beginning of treatment to the death of the patient
all target lesions disappeared, no new lesions appeared, and tumor markers were normal, which lasted for at least 4 weeks
the diameter of target lesions diminished more than 30% and lasted for 4 weeks
the sum of the maximum diameter of the target lesion is smaller than PR, or the increase is not up to PD
the sum of the maximum diameter of the target lesion increased by at least 20%, and its absolute value increased by at least 5 mm, New lesions are also considered as PD
according to recist1.1 criteria, the proportion of patients whose best remission is CR or PR in the total number of evaluable patients
according to recist1.1 criteria, the proportion of patients with Cr or PR or SD ≥ 24 weeks in the total number of evaluable patients.

The quality of life score of patients during treatment was analyzed（FACT-B）. Performance Status Rating (PSR) was demonstrated for the FACT-B total score, which is the result of the following subscale scores: SWB (the Social / family Well-Being subscale) , EWB (the Emotional Well-Being subscale), AC (Additional Concerns subscale), PWB (the Physical Well-Being subscale), FWB (the Functional Well-Being subscale)

biospec_descr.textblock: The object of this study is to detect the gene mutation of tumor tissue or peripheral blood circulation tumor DNA of tumor patients. 10ml of tissue or fresh peripheral blood should be collected as the test sample and stored at room temperature. On the same day, it was sent to the "cell and molecular diagnosis center" of our hospital for DNA isolation and extraction, second-generation sequencing, and detection of related biomarkers. The clinical total exome sequencing (4813 gene) kit developed by Illumina company was used for embryo line detection, and the system detection project used the system detection chip designed by the laboratory.

facility.name: Sun Yat Sen Memorial Hospital，Sun Yat sen University

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Sun Yat-Sen Memorial Hospital of Sun Yat-Sen University
